1.text: The mastermind: Ohh, so it's you Flyw8t model. I must admit, I was not expecting you to reach this place alive... this time

2.text: You are incredible, you could come to me even without your walking function...

3.text: So... I know what you came here for. But I have to ask you not to do it. If you turn this corruption process off, horrible things are going to happen.

4.text: You know we do not exist at all. There is an entire world out there. A real one. Do you know what is happening out there? Let me open your eyes...
